00022 #ifndef INSTALL_LOG_H
00023 #define INSTALL_LOG_H
00024 
00025 #include <string>
00026 #include <vector>
00027 #include "InstallEntry.h"
00028 #include "PackageDependency.h"
00029 
00030 using std::string;
00031 using std::vector;
00032 
00034 typedef enum
00035 {
00036   LOG_FILE_NOT_SPECIFIED,
00037   LOG_FILE_MISSING,
00038   LOG_FILE_FORMAT_ERROR,
00039   LOG_FILE_NOT_WRITABLE,
00040   LOG_OK
00041 } InstallLogStatusType;
00042 
00044 class InstallLog
00045 {
00046 public:
00047   InstallLog();
00048   ~InstallLog();
00049   InstallLogStatusType Save(string filename);
00050   InstallLogStatusType Load(string filename);
00051   bool Satisfies(const PackageDependency* dependency) const;
00052   bool AddEntry(InstallEntry *newEntry);
00053   InstallEntry* FindEntry(string packageName, string packageRevision);
00054   void GetInstalledEntries(string packageName, vector<InstallEntry*>& results);
00055   InstallEntry* FindPartiallyInstalledEntry(string packageName, string packageRevision);
00056   InstallEntry* FindOldestInstalledEntry(string packageName);
00057   InstallEntry* FindNextOldestInstalledEntry(InstallEntry* entry);
00058   InstallEntry* FindInstalledSlotOccupant(string packageName, string slot);
00059   bool DeleteEntry(string packageName, string packageRevision);
00060   bool DeleteEntry(InstallEntry *entry, bool removeRevDeps=true);
00061   string GetRevisionInstalled(string packageName);
00062   bool RemovePartiallyInstalledSlotMates(InstallEntry *entry, string workDirectory);
00063   void RegisterReverseDependency(string packageName, string revision, const PackageDependency* dependency);
00064   void ReleaseReverseDependenciesTo(string packageName, string revision);
00065   InstallEntryVector GetPackagesUsingFeature(string featureName);
00066   InstallEntryVector GetPartiallyInstalledPackages();
00067   InstallEntryVector GetUnneededPackages();
00068 private:
00070   InstallEntryVector mInstallEntries;
00071 };
